titles.title: A resolution recognizing the historical significance of the Mexican holiday of Cinco de Mayo.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 5/5/2009--Passed Senate without amendment. Recognizes the historical struggle for independence and freedom of the people of Mexico. Calls upon the people of the United States to observe Cinco de Mayo with appropriate ceremonies and activities.
